title: Style Home hero heading as “HR ACADEMY” with two-color treatment

requirements.summary: Replace the Home page hero H1 with a fixed two-part “HR ACADEMY” title where “HR” is white and “ACADEMY” uses the existing red accent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: In the hero H1 on the Home page, the displayed title reads exactly “HR ACADEMY”.
The “HR” portion of the title is rendered in white and the “ACADEMY” portion is rendered in red (using the app’s existing red accent styling, e.g., `text-accent-red`).
The string “Welcome to HR Academy” is no longer shown in the hero heading in either normal or preview mode.

file_operations.description: Update the hero section H1 to render a two-part heading (e.g., separate spans) that always displays “HR ACADEMY”, with “HR” styled as white and “ACADEMY” styled with the existing red accent class (e.g., `text-accent-red`). Ensure the H1 no longer uses `pageContent?.heroTitle` so that any previously configured title such as “Welcome to HR Academy” will not appear in either normal or preview mode.
